attributes.action: Publicly condemn the decision by the Labour policy unit to officially ban Christmas festivities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The IPPR think tank has stated that 'official Christmas celebrations should be barred in order to avoid upsetting foreigners living in the UK'. The cash saved would be used to promote other faiths' religious ceremonies. This is a clear violation of the Religious Discrimination Act which forbids discriminating against one religion
